title: Tripping With The Tax Man & Perla Del Mar Cigars
itunes:title: Tripping With The Tax Man & Perla Del Mar Cigars
description:
The Beatles once sang, If you drive a car, I’ll tax the street, If you try to sit, I’ll tax your seat. If you get too cold I’ll tax the heat, If you take a walk, I’ll tax your feet.” It doesn’t end there, and on today being Tax Day (Yeah, we know you have until the 18th this year), we take a look at the taxes collected in the US on Alcohol, Tobacco and Firearms.

We also light up Perla Del Mar which is part of The Cigar Authority care package. We light it up twice, the second time while we are tripping on MBerry. What is MBerry you ask? Tune in and find out.

We also have Recluse Barry with Cigar News, Mr. Jonathan takes us into the Asylum, the Classic 3-Way and of course Chuck Morrison gets Debonaire.

Join the longest running podcast on cigars live from Two Guys Smoke Shop; The Cigar Authority for a nerf-tastic time!

As always, you can find many of the cigars discussed on the show at www.2guyscigars.com.
